methods.name: public Builder setCodecId(long codecId)
methods.comment:
* Set the codec ID field as defined by the Basic Audio Profile. * *

The codec ID field has 5 octets, with - Octet 0: Coding_Format as defined in Bluetooth * Assigned Numbers - Octet 1-2: Company ID as defined in Bluetooth Assigned Numbers Shall * be 0x0000 if octet 0 != 0xFF - Octet 3-4: Vendor-specific codec ID Shall be 0x0000 if * octet 0 != 0xFF * * @param codecId 5-byte codec ID field in Java long format * @return this builder * @hide

methods.name: public Builder setCodecSpecificConfig(@NonNull BluetoothLeAudioCodecConfigMetadata codecSpecificConfig)
methods.comment:
* Set codec specific config metadata for this subgroup.
         *
         * @param codecSpecificConfig codec specific config metadata for this subgroup
         * @throws NullPointerException if codecSpecificConfig is null
         * @return this builder
         * @hide

methods.name: public Builder setContentMetadata(@NonNull BluetoothLeAudioContentMetadata contentMetadata)
methods.comment:
* Set content metadata for this Broadcast Source subgroup.
         *
         * @param contentMetadata content metadata for this Broadcast Source subgroup
         * @throws NullPointerException if contentMetadata is null
         * @return this builder
         * @hide

methods.name: public Builder addChannel(@NonNull BluetoothLeBroadcastChannel channel)
methods.comment:
* Add a Broadcast Channel to this Broadcast subgroup. * *

Each Broadcast Channel represents a Broadcast Isochronous Stream (BIS) * *

A Broadcast subgroup should contain at least 1 Broadcast Channel * * @param channel a Broadcast Channel to be added to this Broadcast subgroup * @throws NullPointerException if channel is null * @return this builder * @hide

methods.name: public Builder clearChannel()
methods.comment:
* Clear channel list so that one can reset the builder after create it from an existing
         * object.
         *
         * @return this builder
         * @hide

methods.name: public BluetoothLeBroadcastSubgroup build()
methods.comment:
* Build {@link BluetoothLeBroadcastSubgroup}.
         *
         * @return constructed {@link BluetoothLeBroadcastSubgroup}
         * @throws NullPointerException if {@link NonNull} items are null
         * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the object cannot be built
         * @hide
